title: Charming Umbrian Country Escape with Wine Tasting and Dining Inclusions
description: Escape on a road trip through the breathtaking natural scenery of rolling hills and medieval towns of Italy's picturesque region of Umbria to reach Griffin’s Resort - a traditional country house set on a spectacular wine estate. Your Italian retreat includes daily breakfast, a wine-tasting experience at the on-site winery, a traditional three-course dinner and a complimentary bottle of wine on arrival.
